vbuf_setup_raw_auto_addr_t Struct Reference

Structure used to setup the parameters for a VBUF configuration with auto address-generation. More...

#include <ocmc_ecc_l2.h>

Detailed Description

Structure used to setup the parameters for a VBUF configuration with auto address-generation.

vbuf_size 16-byte aligned VBUF size in bytes

cbuf_size 16-byte aligned CBUF size in bytes
